title: Wordle, the Viral Word Game: What Is It, How Do You Play and Tricks to Impress Your Friends
sub_head: Everything you need to know about the online game that has taken the internet by storm
body:
Wordle, an online word game, seems like it’s everywhere these days. Here’s what you need to know.
It’s a once-a-day word game that has gone viral in the last few weeks. It can only be played on a website.
